item.title: 2.3 Virtualization
item.description: State/Version: Draft 2.3 Proxmox 2.3.1 Setup 2.3.2 Maintenance 2.3 Proxmox Proxmox Virtual Environment Compute, network, and storage in a single solution 2.3.1 Setup Current setup uses single proxmox-node 2.3.2 Maintenance manual patching: weekly-monday
